snippet.title:
Ode to The Music Man3 years ago in Flowers, Trees & Plants
116 Comments
More Like This

To Me, Music Is... The percussion is the rain on my windows The melody is the whistle when the wind blows The chorus is the chirping of crickets in June Man, oh man, I love that tune I dance to the beat of the rain all night When I hear the wind whistle, I'll be alright As long as there's music, by nature or freestyle Any good song always makes me smile I don't need an iPod or an MP3 Nature's song is fine with me I just need an honest beat And friends to dance with in the street Prosaic singers, heavy synths, Clich√©d lyrics on radio hits That kind of music doesn't stay true Every time I hear it, I feel so blue I'd pick a nightingale's tune over all The empty songs that the MCs call "Popular, the best, what's in, no doubt," If that's what's in, I'd rather be out I prefer a piano, or an acoustic guitar I'm tired of songs about getting drunk at the bar Music needs meaning, not immodest fame Lyrics need love, not unending shame Music is so many things, Music is my everything Music is my motivation, pushTo Me, Music Is...2 years ago in Free Verse

Lullaby For A Dead Man -LyricsLife is still spinning, Your end my beginning And everything I hoped for has been strangely set aside Reason for living, My mind is forgiving And destiny is proving to be absent from my life I know it, I feel it, I know when you're sleeping, I know the things you're dreaming And I know you will never give up and die. Conscious fulfilling, The darkness revealing all, Thoughts and insecurities are shining like the sun... Eyes are deceiving, Your mind will stop breathing, And all that you are made of will now rightly become mine. You know it, You feel it, I know when you're sleeping, I know the things you're dreaming, I love it when you're weeping, Even death can't stop this feeling And I know you will never give up and die Father, why have you forsaken me, My life is gone. Father, know how long it's taken me, I live again! I know when you're sleeping, I know the things you're dreaming. I know when you're sleeping, I know the things you're dreaming. I love when you're weeping Even death cLullaby For A Dead Man -Lyrics3 years ago in Songs & Lyrics
